questions.question: Following the Israeli strike on a compound in Doha that reportedly targeted senior Hamas figures and prompted an emergency UN Security Council meeting, which country's prime minister publicly condemned the attack at that UN session?
questions.explanation: Qatar’s prime minister, Sheikh Mohammed bin Abdulrahman al-Thani, publicly condemned the strike at the emergency United Nations Security Council meeting, saying the attack violated Qatari sovereignty and ignored the fate of hostages.

questions.question: In the recent federal decision to extend Woodside’s North West Shelf (Karratha) gas project to 2070, who gave final federal approval for the extension?
questions.explanation: Environment Minister Murray Watt issued the formal federal approval allowing Woodside’s North West Shelf project to continue operating until 2070, subject to conditions and a partial heritage declaration. His final approval was announced on Sep 12, 2025 (a proposed/provisional approval had been made in May 2025).

questions.question: In the recent decision to shelve the Grand Prix Amendment Bill, what change would the bill have allowed the Australian Grand Prix Corporation (AGPC) to make to Albert Park's exclusive race/lockout period?

answers.text: Reduce the exclusive period from seven days to three days
Keep Albert Park closed to the public year‑round during Grand Prix works
Extend the exclusive Albert Park lockout from seven days to up to 21 days
Permanently transfer control of Albert Park to the Australian Grand Prix Corporation

questions.explanation: The Allan Labor Government's Grand Prix Amendment Bill sought to allow the AGPC to extend the Albert Park exclusive race/lockout period from the current seven days to up to 21 days; the bill was shelved after it failed to win crossbench support.

questions.question: In the Sydney Roosters' 40–10 win over the Cronulla Sharks that completed an undefeated NRLW regular season, which Roosters player left the game with a suspected knee injury?
questions.explanation: Tarryn Aiken, the Roosters halfback, was assisted from the field with a suspected knee injury and was awaiting scans. Other Roosters who left or were affected in the match had different issues (Amber Hall — calf, Jayme Fressard — ankle) and Jocelyn Kelleher remained on and took over kicking duties.

questions.question: Following Gabriella Brooks' public confirmation of her engagement to Liam Hemsworth in recent Australian coverage, how did she announce it?

answers.text: Posted a written statement on Twitter
Posted photos on Instagram, including a close‑up of her engagement ring
Revealed it during a televised interview
Issued an official press release through their representatives

questions.explanation: Australian outlets reported that Gabriella Brooks confirmed the engagement by posting photos on Instagram — including images of the couple and a close‑up of her engagement ring — which was widely covered on 12 September 2025.
